languages.text: {n}Вкрадчивый шепот вновь расцветает в голове — эхо слов, которых никогда не было, и что были всегда.{/n} "Настал момент явить Истину, Дитя Рассвета. Молви последнее имя, дабы предначертанное сбылось: Самет. Я буду ждать нашей встречи".

{n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."
languages.original_text: {n}Вкрадчивый шепот вновь расцветает в голове — эхо слов, которых никогда не было, и что были всегда.{/n} "Настал момент явить Истину, Дитя Рассвета. Молви последнее имя, дабы предначертанное сбылось: Самет. Я буду ждать нашей встречи".

traits.locale_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak these words to fulfil what was foretold: 'I walk the thread of Daybreak that leads me from the maw of the irrevocable and beyond the limits of the possible.' I will await our meeting."

{n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak these words to fulfil what was foretold: 'I walk the thread of Daybreak that leads me from the maw of the irrevocable and beyond the limits of the possible.' I will await our meeting."

{n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

{n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

languages.text: {n}柔和的耳语声再次在你的脑海中绽放，那些声音是从未说过的话语传来的回声，而又像时间本身一样古老。{/n}“黎明之子，真理显现的时刻即将到来。说出最终的名字‘萨梅斯’，实现预言吧。我期待我们的会面。”
languages.original_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}柔和的耳语声再次在你的脑海中绽放，那些声音是从未说过的话语传来的回声，而又像时间本身一样古老。{/n}“黎明之子，真理显现的时刻即将到来，说出这些话，实现预言吧。‘我沿着黎明的道路前进。它指引我走出了无法挽回的灾厄，超越了一切可能的极限。’我期待我们的会面。”

languages.text: {n}Das sanfte Flüstern erblüht wieder in deinem Kopf. Ein Echo von Worten, die gesagt wurden und doch so alt wie die Zeit selbst sind.{/n} "Es ist der Augenblick gekommen, in dem die Wahrheit offenbart wird, Kind der Dämmerung. Sprecht den letzten Namen, um zu erfüllen, was vorhergesagt wurde: 'Sameth.' Ich erwarte unser Treffen."
languages.original_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das sanfte Flüstern erblüht wieder in deinem Kopf. Ein Echo von Worten, die gesagt wurden und doch so alt wie die Zeit selbst sind.{/n} "Es ist der Augenblick gekommen, in dem die Wahrheit offenbart wird, Kind der Dämmerung. Sprecht diese Worte, um zu erfüllen, was vorhergesagt wurde: 'Ich wandle auf dem Faden des Tagesanbruchs, der mich vom Schlund des Unwiderruflichen bis hinter die Grenzen des Möglichen führt.' Ich erwarte unser Treffen."

languages.text: {n}El zalamero susurro acaricia tu mente una vez más: un eco de palabras que nunca se pronunciaron, y que aun así son tan antiguas como el tiempo.{/n} «Ha llegado el momento de revelar la Verdad, Vástago del Amanecer. Pronuncia el nombre final para cumplir la profecía: "Sameth". Aguardaré nuestro encuentro».
languages.original_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}El zalamero susurro acaricia tu mente una vez más: un eco de palabras que nunca se pronunciaron, y que aun así son tan antiguas como el tiempo.{/n} «Ha llegado el momento de revelar la Verdad, Vástago del Amanecer. Repite estas palabras para cumplir lo que se profetizó: «Camino por el hilo del Amanecer que guía mis pasos desde las fauces de lo irrevocable y más allá de los límites de lo posible". Aguardaré nuestro encuentro».

languages.text: {n}Le murmure suave résonne à nouveau dans votre tête : un écho formé de mots jamais prononcés, mais pourtant vieux comme le monde.{/n} « Il est temps de révéler la vérité, enfant de l'Aube. Prononcez ce dernier nom pour accomplir la prophétie : "Sameth". J'attends notre rencontre. »
languages.original_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le murmure suave résonne à nouveau dans votre tête : un écho formé de mots jamais prononcés, mais pourtant vieux comme le monde.{/n} « Il est temps de révéler la vérité, enfant de l'Aube. Prononcez ces mots pour accomplir la prophétie : "Je suis la voie de l'Aube qui me conduit des tréfonds de l'irrévocable jusqu'aux frontières du possible." J'attends notre rencontre. »

languages.text: {n}頭の中で、あの耳心地の良いささやきが再び活気づく。未だかつて語られたことのない、時のように古い言葉のこだまが。{/n}「暁の子よ、真実が明らかにされる時が来た。予言をかなえるべく、かの最後の名、『セイムス』を唱えるのだ。私は、私たちの出会いを待っている」
languages.original_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."

traits.locale_text: {n}頭の中で、あの耳心地の良いささやきが再び活気づく。未だかつて語られたことのない、時のように古い言葉のこだまが。{/n}「暁の子よ、真実が明らかにされる時が来た。予言をかなえるべく、かの最後の名、『セイムス』を唱えるのだ。私は、私たちの出会いを待っている」

languages.text: {n}O tatlı ses yine kulaklarını okşuyor. Dedikleri, hiç söylenmemiş ama zamanın kendisi kadar eski sözlerin birer yankısı.{/n} "Hakikat'in ortaya çıkma vakti geldi Şafak Evladı. Son sözü söyle ve kehaneti tamamla. 'Sameth' de. Telakimizi bekleyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The suave whisper blossoms in your head again: an echo of words that were never said and yet are as old as time.{/n} "The moment has come for the Truth to be revealed, Child of the Dawn. Speak the final name to fulfil what was foretold: 'Sameth.' I will await our meeting."
